overview: All five of the scenes in this debut release shine with sexual intensity -- from the opening duo between Tim Rusty and Jamal, an interracial fuck sequence set on the catwalk, to the final gangbang of the evil captain Matthew Green, "Mutiny: Shipmates Revenge" is packed full of hot sex. Not to be missed is the domination scene between Matthew Green and newcomer Ian Alexander -- Matthew makes Ian lick even the undersides of his boots while dressed in a full Captain's uniform, and after fucking him strings him upside down for a flogging sequence that is too hot to handle.
title: Mutiny: Shipmates Revenge!
